name: Cactimelon: Rise to the top
description:
Half melon, half cactus, 100% friend. See how far you can take Cactimelon on his journey to the top!

Best enjoyed on mobile devices!

Liluo link:  https://liluo.io/atomicpotato/cactimelon-rise-to-the-top

Controls:
1. Tab and hold to aim Cactimelon.
2. Release to fire Cactimelon.
3. Cactimelon sticks to clouds and platforms.

Goal:
See how far you can take Cactimelon on his journey to claim your place on the leaderboard!

Credits:
Scripting and Gameplay logic - Emil Valentin
Art - Sashana Sivasothy
Music and Sound Effects - Leon Groth

How the game was made:
All sprites in the game is drawn by hand and scanned in digitally to be colored and scaled in GIMP. Music and sound effects were made in FL Studio. Lastly all the art, music/sounds and mechanics were put together in GDevelop.
